text: Hi guys, Is there any way to trigger python script on form submission? I am thinking of using AJAX call OnFormSubmit event, any suggestions? Can I do the same with Webhook action? (The script is using python requests module to call external REST API )

Hey <@UBQSVT1HA>, I think an AJAX call is probably your best bet. HubSpot doesn’t offer webhooks for form submissions specifically.  It has contact create webhooks, but that could be for any contact that was created, not just those who submitted a form. The assumption here is that your python script will allow for cross origin requests.  If it doesn’t then we can discuss an alternative solution
you oauth URL so i can test authenticating it with the different users we have here with different sets of permissions
